problem_text: For trapezoid Q R S T, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If T S = 2 x, P M = 20, and Q R = 6 x, find x.
compact_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If TS = 2x, PM = 20, and QR = 6x, find x.
annotat_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If TS = 2x, PM = 20, and QR = 6x, find x.
